titles.title: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2011
A bill to make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.
Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2011- Amends the Internet Tax Freedom Act to make permanent the ban on state and local taxation of Internet access and on multiple or discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce.
